thread.title: Great Location; Great for Families
thread.title_full: Great Location; Great for Families - Review of Hotel Wales, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: JBJinRVA
title: Great Location; Great for Families
text: We stayed at the Hotel Wales for four nights (Wed. to Sun.) with our two young daughters (ages 6 and 8). We had a king suite with a pull-out sofa bed for the girls. Our room (815) had a lovely view of the park. Street traffic was noisy at all hours during the week and quieter on the weekend. It woke me up a few times but the girls slept well, being just slightly more interior. The suite had a tiny bathroom with shower (no tub), but was very clean. The size of the room was impressive for NYC, at a great rate. There were many walkable options for all meals. We ate at Third Ave Ale House (with kids) and San Matteo (great pizza, a bit of a walk) and imported breakfast twice from bakeries within two blocks of the hotel. The staff were friendly and helpful. The subway is a few blocks away (a 10+ minute walk). Overall the hotel had a very warm and welcoming feel; we will stay here again!
